text: Fire Stick outputs black screen after latest firmware update to version 5.5.7. Audio works but no video display.
Kindle app freeze indicates insufficient RAM. Force quit app, clear all cached data, disable background apps, then restart device.
Prime Video app version 6.12.1 crashes immediately on iPad running Windows 11. Error code server error displays before crash.
That's a sync issue. Try factory reset on Echo Dot, then re-pair in Alexa app. Ensure both devices on same WiFi network SSID.
Alexa app won't sync with Echo Dot 4th generation. Device firmware 5.2.7, smartphone OS Android 13. Connection times out.
Black screen after firmware update suggests display driver issue. Try factory reset Fire Stick to previous firmware version 3.4.2.
Kindle app freezes on loading screen. Fire Tablet 10 HD with 2GB RAM, 64GB storage. Cleared cache twice, still unresponsive.
Let's troubleshoot that crash. First, uninstall app completely, reboot Fire Stick, then reinstall from app store. Check OS compatibility.
Fire Stick outputs black screen after latest firmware update to version 2.3.7. Audio works but no video display.
